item.title: Templating as Automation
item.description: In this post, I’ll cover different examples of what I like to call templating. Doing the same over and over again, but only few parts change each iteration. Environment Variables While working on integrating an API, I had to authenticate with a Bearer token in the authentication header. These tokens are typically short-lived, so they change multiple times a day. As part of the integration, I write down the API calls in Typora, a very nice markdown editor.
